mintByOwner(address,uint256,uint256,byte.details: Creates `amount` new tokens for `to`, of token type `id`. See {ERC1155-_mint}. Requirements: - the caller must be diamond owner.

devdoc.title: ERC1155 - Mint as owner - with meta transactions

userdoc.notice: Allow minting as owner via ERC2771 Context meta transactions (signed by the owner private key)
